* pacman -Si package info
* pacman -Qi local package info
* pacman -Qii plus backup files
* pacman -Qip package info for a PKGBUILD
* pacman -Fl owned file list
* pacman -Ql local owned file list
* pacman -Qlp file list for a PKGBUILD
* pacman -Sg list packages of a group
* pacman -Qd installed dependencies
* pacman -Qe packages explicitly installed
* pacman -Qdt orphaned packages
* pacman -Fy/-Sy updates the package DB
* pacman -F Search for package that contains file
* pacman -Fx Lists which package owns a file, even not installed
* pacman -Qo Lists which installed package owns a file
* pacman -Qk List count of installed files
* pacman -Sc Remove files not installed from cache
* pacman -Rs Remove package and dependencies
* pacman -Rcs Remove all packages that depend on target and target dependencies
* pacman -Rcns Also unneeded configs
* pacman -Syu Sync package DB and download updates
* pacman -Syuw Download packages but don't update
